meanings.definition: A crystalline alkaloid, C19H21NO3, obtained from the bark of Galipea officinalis (Angustura bark). It has been used medicinally.
meanings.english_definition: A crystalline alkaloid, C19H21NO3, obtained from the bark of Galipea officinalis (Angustura bark). It has been used medicinally.

etymology.value: Derived from the genus name *Galipea* (from which it is extracted) and the suffix '-oidine' (indicating an alkaloid).
